name: Coral Springs
description: Licensed Coral Springs electricians providing professional residential and commercial electrical services. From modern kitchen remodels in Wyndham Lakes to commercial projects on Sample Road, Solomon Electric is your local partner.
landmarks: Coral Springs Center for the Arts

challenges.title: Master-Planned Community Standards
challenges.description: Coral Springs' strict aesthetic and building standards require electricians who understand local HOA requirements and municipal codes for consistent quality.

challenges.title: Aging Suburban Infrastructure
challenges.description: Neighborhoods built in the 70s and 80s, like Ramblewood, often require panel upgrades and aluminum wiring remediation to support modern electrical loads.

challenges.title: Smart Irrigation & Landscape Power
challenges.description: Many Coral Springs properties feature extensive landscaping and smart irrigation that require specialized outdoor power solutions and GFCI protection.

faqs.question: What electrical services do you offer in Coral Springs?
faqs.answer: We provide comprehensive electrical services throughout Coral Springs including panel upgrades (100A to 200A), emergency repairs, outlet and switch installation, lighting upgrades, ceiling fan installation, GFCI protection, EV charger installation, generator hookups, and 24/7 emergency service. Our licensed electricians serve all Coral Springs neighborhoods.

faqs.question: Are your electricians licensed to work in Coral Springs?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. All Solomon Electric technicians are Florida State Licensed (License #EC13012419) and fully insured. We pull all required Broward County permits for electrical work in Coral Springs, ensuring your project passes inspection and meets current NEC code requirements.

faqs.question: How do I know if my Coral Springs home needs a panel upgrade?
faqs.answer: Many Coral Springs homes have outdated 100-amp panels that can't handle modern electrical demands. Signs you need an upgrade include: frequently tripping breakers, dimming lights when appliances run, planning to add an EV charger or pool, or if you have a Federal Pacific, Zinsco, or fuse box. We offer free panel inspections throughout Coral Springs.

faqs.question: Do you offer 24/7 emergency electrical service in Coral Springs?
faqs.answer: Yes! We provide round-the-clock emergency electrical service to all Coral Springs neighborhoods. If you're experiencing sparking outlets, burning smells, power outages, or any electrical emergency, call us immediately—we respond quickly to protect your property and family.

faqs.question: Are you licensed to work in the City of Coral Springs?
faqs.answer: Yes, we are fully licensed (FL License #EC13012419) and insured. We frequently work with the Coral Springs Building Department and are well-versed in local code requirements.

faqs.question: Do you offer emergency electrical repairs for Coral Springs residents?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We provide 24/7 emergency service throughout Coral Springs, including Wyndham Lakes, Eagle Ridge, and all major residential areas.

seoContent.heading: Trusted Coral Springs Electricians At Your Service
seoContent.body: Coral Springs is a premier master-planned city known for its family values and beautiful green spaces. As a city that prides itself on 'Everything Under the Sun,' it deserves electrical service that is reliable, professional, and code-compliant. Solomon Electric has been providing top-tier electrical solutions to Coral Springs families since 2003.

seoContent.heading: Understanding Coral Springs's Electrical Needs
seoContent.body: Coral Springs homes and businesses have unique electrical requirements that demand local expertise. Our electricians understand Broward County building codes, climate considerations, and the specific challenges of South Florida electrical systems. From aging infrastructure in established neighborhoods to modern smart home installations, we provide solutions tailored to Coral Springs's needs.

seoContent.heading: Comprehensive Electrical Services for Your Coral Springs Home
seoContent.body: Whether you're upgrading an older home's electrical system, installing modern energy-efficient lighting, adding an EV charger, or facing an urgent electrical issue, our licensed team delivers professional solutions throughout Coral Springs. We provide transparent upfront pricing, respect your property, and stand behind our work with guarantees that have earned South Florida's trust for over 15 years.

seoContent.heading: Expert Electrical Modernization for Your Coral Springs Home
seoContent.body: Whether you're updating your kitchen lighting at The Walk, installing a whole-home surge protector to guard against Florida storms, or need an urgent panel upgrade in Maplewood, our team is ready to help. We provide upfront pricing and a satisfaction guarantee on every Coral Springs project.
